hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo '[Unit]' > /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo 'Description=Hostname-Date-Task' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh
echo '[Service]' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo 'Type=notify' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo 'ExecStart=/tmp/hostname-date.sh' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo 'KillMode=process' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo 'Restart=on-failure' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo 'RestartSec=30s' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh
echo '[Install]' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo 'WantedBy=multi-user.target' >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh
systemctl start hostname-date.sh systemctl enable hostname-date.sh
